text: @realDonaldTrump I also need special care. Life is a right and not a privilege. I mean we pay for social security through our jobs. Time for social security benefits to kick in during this #CoronavirusPandemic #CoronavirusOutbreak. A door-to-door testing would have captured and isolated cases.😥

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
